confirm.title: Confirmation
confirm.description: Are you absolutely sure that you want to delete all of your data? All data stored in the database will be wiped. This is irreversible. Please confirm with the buttons below. As a side note, you can view all of your data with /data view.

all.title: Commands
all.description: Arguments in brackets are required. Arguments in arrows are sometimes required based on the previous argument. You can use the command /help [command] [a command] to see more about a specific command.

dm.name: Direct Messages
dm.value: This command cannot be used in a DM channel

owner.name: Bot Owner
owner.value: Being an owner is required to execute this command

language.title: Language Set
language.description: Your language has been changed to `%{language}%`!

defender.title: Defender Module
defender.description: You can add or remove modules here. See more about a module by selecting it. Then, press the button to remove or add it. If you want to delete some or all of your data used by or associated with this bot, you can request it with /deletedata.

toggle.label: Toggle
toggle.description: Toggle whether this module is active
toggle.longDescription: Enable or disable this module. However, this module will not be activated if you have not configured it.

toggle.label: Toggle
toggle.description: Toggle whether this module is active
toggle.longDescription: Enable or disable this module. However, this module cannot be enabled if you have not configured it.

channel.label: Channel
channel.description: Set a channel to send logins and logouts to
channel.longDescription: Due to limitations, you need to set a channel with /channel

toggle.label: Toggle
toggle.description: Toggle whether this module is active
toggle.longDescription: Enable or disable this module. However, this module will not be activated if you have not configured it.

grace.label: Grace Period
grace.description: Set when the bot should start alerting you
grace.longDescription: Set the amount of hours ahead of the daily reward reset for when the bot should start pinging you

embed2.title: üèì Ping!
embed2.description: Websocket heartbeat is %{wsPing}%ms. Roundtrip latency is %{rtPing}%ms.

invalid.title: Invalid Input
invalid.description: The username/UUID provided is invalid! The username cannot contain invalid characters. UUIDs must match the following regex: `/^[0-9a-f]{8}[0-9a-f]{4}[1-5][0-9a-f]{3}[89AB][0-9a-f]{3}[0-9a-f]{12}$/i`. You can test this regex with [__this__](https://regex101.com/r/A866mm/1) site.

notFound.title: Not Found
notFound.description: That %{inputType}% doesn't seem to be valid. Check to see if you spelt it wrong.

unlinked.title: Unlinked Account
unlinked.description: You have not linked your Discord account to your Minecraft account on Hypixel! Follow the guide below. If you just linked it, please wait a few minutes and try again.

mismatched.title: Mismatched Tag
mismatched.description: That Minecraft account currently has a different Discord account linked! If that is your account, follow the guide below to relink it. If you just relinked linked it, please wait a few minutes and try again.

register.title: Registered
register.description: Registered successfully! You can now add modules with /modules.

field.name: Next Steps
field.value:
/help ‚Ä¢ See information about any command or about this bot
/language ‚Ä¢ Set a language for this bot

blockedUsers.title: Blocked User
blockedUsers.description: You were blocked from using this bot. You cannot appeal this.

devMode.title: Developer Mode
devMode.description: This bot is in developer only mode, likely due to a major issue or an upgrade that is taking place. Please check back later!

owner.title: Insufficient Permissions
owner.description: You cannot execute this command without being an owner!

dm.title: DM Channel
dm.description: You cannot execute this command in the DM channel! Please switch to a server channel!

embed1.title: Cooldown
embed1.description: You are executing commands too quickly! This cooldown of this command is %{cooldown}% seconds. This message will turn green in %{timeLeft}% seconds once the cooldown expires.

embed2.title: Cooldown Over
embed2.description: The cooldown has expired! You can now execute the command /%{commandName}%!

missingData.title: Missing Data
missingData.description: Your last login and/or last logout data returned undefined for the Friend module. Login and logout notifications are now disabled. This may be a result of disabling the `Online` API option on Hypixel or setting your social status to offline. Notifications will resume and you will receive another DM once this data is no longer missing.

receivedData.title: Received Data
receivedData.description: Your last login and/or last logout data is no longer undefined for the Friend module. Login and logout notifications will now resume.

missingPermissions.title: Missing Permissions
missingPermissions.description: This bot is missing the following permissions in the channel <#%{channelID}%>: %{missingPermissions}%. The Friends Module has been toggled off due to this issue.

suppressNext.title: Alert Suppressed
suppressNext.description: Your latest alert for the Friend Module has been suppressed, and login/logout notifications will now resume.

claimedNotification.title: Daily Reward Claimed
claimedNotification.description: You now have a daily streak of %{rewardScore}% with %{totalDailyRewards}% total daily rewards!

milestone.title: Congratulations
milestone.description: üéâ You have reached a daily streak of %{milestone}%! To opt out of future milestone messages, uae /modules

rewardReminder.title: Daily Reward Reminder
description: You haven't claimed your daily reward yet!
This is a reminder to claim your daily reward as it appears you haven't claimed it!
It appears that you have not claimed your daily reward yet!
You should go collect your daily reward!
Your daily reward is waiting for you!
It is time to go claim your daily reward!
d a i l y r e w a r d!
Arr! We sentence ye t' go claim yer daily reward!
This is a remindeth'r to claimeth thy daily reward as t appears thee haven't claim'd t!
